name: SNK vs CAPCOM
overview: A new C64 game which is using their in development fighting engine known as RetroFighter, a versus fighting engine with new features implemented such as a new UI and colour selection for each player, intro sequences before the battle commences for each player, flaming hits and projectiles, special moves, and different battle arenas. It features guard breakers and reversal moves, stage selection in versus mode and complete character storylines with intermission and even ending animations! Features fighting by Ryu, Ken, Chun-Li, Guile, Felicia, Zangief, Vega, Gouki, Ryo Sakazaki, Terry Bogard, Mai Shiranui, Andy Bogard, Leona Heidern, Wolfgang Krauser, Orochi Iori and Geese Howard.
